detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, cap sleeves, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt. One dress has a chest pocket.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Double-layered, calf-length dress in a crinkled cotton weave with a round neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, pockets in the side seams and gathered seams at the hips and knees.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined lace body with a low-cut back, shoulder straps with a decorative knot detail and lined gusset with press-studs. Mesh lining.
Bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 6x15.5x24 cm.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Padded jacket with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a drawstring at the hem.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative tie detail at the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf knitted in soft cashmere with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x175 cm.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, wide top in a cotton weave with a print motif, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed detailing and ribbing around the neckline.
Shorter top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Short skirt in a textured knit a concealed zip at the back, front pockets with frayed edges and a frayed hem. Lined.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Satin-covered Alice band with a pointed, felted clown hat that has a faux fur pompom on top.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 65 cm and 77 cm.
Short top in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide ribbing at the hem.
Metal bangle.

Calf-length shirt dress in silk with a soft, crêpe finish and a knot detail that adds fullness and structure to the front. Pleats for added width at the back and long sleeves with pleats and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.

Shirt in a cotton and viscose weave with a collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Platform sandals in imitation leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in soft, thermal fleece. Hat with sewn-on ears at the top and a hook and a loop fastening under the chin. Mittens with elastication at the wrists. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.

Playsuit in chiffon made from recycled polyester with covered buttons at the front, a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with a turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Suede slip-on trainers with a lightly padded top edge and elastic gores in the sides. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides.

Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to long shorts. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and legs that can be folded up and fastened with a tab and button.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with a low waist with lace-covered elastication.
Short jersey top with long sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Short polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Sandals in canvas with wedge heels covered in braided jute. Foot strap at the front and ties around the ankle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 12 cm.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif and appliqué on the front.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Short jumper in a soft chenille knit with long raglan sleeves.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Dress in stretch denim with a V-neck and adjustable straps at the front. Cut-out section at the back with a button and concealed zip, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
3/4-length, slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 28x180 cm.
Jacket in stretch, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short, fitted blouse in a viscose weave with a low V-neck, covered buttons at the front, smocking at the back and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a wrapover section at the bust. Sweetheart neckline, smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton seersucker with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with a contrasting colour inside. Small embroidered detail on the chest, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide, slightly shorter legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch, patterned weave made from a cotton blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in glittery jersey with long sleeves, a V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover front.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Elasticated hairbands in various materials and designs with a decorative bow.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in spotted tulle. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Tailored shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, decorative metal buttons at the front, a concealed zip in one side and fake welt pockets at the back.
